    • Method Detail

      • normalizeAngle

        public static double normalizeAngle(double angle)
        Limits the angle to between 0 and 359 degrees for all math. All angles should be normalized before use.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle to be normalized
        Returns:
        the normalized angle on [0,359]

      • isValidPower

        public static boolean isValidPower(double pow)
        Parameters:
        pow - motor power
        Returns:
        whether or not the power is valid

      • makeValidPower

        public static double makeValidPower(double pow)
        Makes the provided power into a valid power level.
        Parameters:
        pow - power level to convert
        Returns:
        a properly-limited power level

      • getMotorDirToTarget

        public static int getMotorDirToTarget(double currentAngle,
                      double targetAngle)
        Determines the appropriate direction for a motor to turn.
        Parameters:
        currentAngle - the current angle of the motor
        targetAngle - the target angle of the motor
        Returns:
        an integer value on {-1,0,1} in MotorDir
